response.original_title: Dieux du Stade - Making of Calendar 2013
response.overview: Originally created in support of charity, the popularity of the calendars has been credited for the increased fame of the Stade Fran√ßais team, as well as rugby in general, in France. The calendars are part of a marketing strategy crafted by Max Guazzini, President of the rugby club. A savvy marketer who built the NRJ Radio group, he has successfully used the calendars to attract a new audience to rugby matches (live and on TV), such as women.
response.title: Dieux du Stade - Making of Calendar 2013

titles.title: Dieux du stade Le making of du calendrier 2013
